participant_1.background:
I'm doing my best to stay positive and make the most of my time in school, but I miss being a kid sometimes.
I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment while listening to the Rolling Stones.
its great fun.
I feel closer to some of my family members than others.
i am six feet tall.

participant_2.background:
I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to.
i enjoy going to museums.
i am wiccan , but haven t told them.
i like to smell my own farts.
i spend a good deal of time on social media.

content.text: Hello, what are you up to?
I am just hanging out listening to music and catching up on social media.
Sounds like a good way to spend an afternoon. I am in school right now studying engineering and trying to stay positive.
Engineering sounds cool! What kind of engineering do you study?
I am studying environmental engineering.
Oh that is cool! I love the environment. I am a big fan of nature and museums.
Me too! I love going to museums and learning about the world around me.
I love to smell my own farts.
I am not sure what to say about that.
That is okay. I am not sure what to say about it either.
Do you have any other interests?
I am wiccan, but I haven't told my family yet.
I am not sure what that means.
It is a religion based on nature.
Oh that is interesting. I do not know much about it.
It is a lot to learn. I am still learning about it myself.
It sounds like you have a lot of interesting things going on in your life.
I do! I am always busy with something.
That is good to hear. I like to stay busy too.
I am glad to hear that. I am sure we will get along well.
I am sure we will too
